channel.title: Big Oil on Hanna
channel.description: Recent content in Big Oil on Hanna

item.title: Takeaways from the Wharton Energy Conference
item.description: Since immersing myself into the conservation world, I’ve tried to take every opportunity to learn more so that I can gain a better understanding of the problems we will face in our lifetimes. So with no idea of what to expect and minimal background knowledge on the energy industry, I attended the Wharton Energy Conference.
